comments.body: nit: we can either just refer users to `Windows#fn` for the deprecation message, or copy-paste the javadoc everywhere --- just need to be consistent with one of the approach. Here we are copy-pasting for `until` while not for `maintainMs`.
The "right" deprecation message depends on the subclass type, so I've opted just to add the missing messages.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +132,136 @@     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code duration} is smaller than the window size
     *
     * @deprecated since 2.1. Use {@link Materialized#retention} or directly configure the retention in a store supplier
     *             and use {@link Materialized#as(WindowBytesStoreSupplier)}.
     */
